name: jung_axe_rare_01
text: Just when Axe was ready to kill the wounded gryftok, it jumped into the river.
text_simple: just when axe was ready to kill the wounded gryftok it jumped into the river

name: jung_axe_rare_02
text: The tiny scribe said it didn't matter, but it mattered to Axe! So, Axe went into the river!
text_simple: the tiny scribe said it didnt matter but it mattered to axe so axe went into the river

name: jung_axe_rare_03
text: But swimming was too har-- Er. The fight was UNFAIR with Axe's axe... So Axe had to drop it!
text_simple: but swimming was too har er the fight was unfair with axes axe so axe had to drop it

name: jung_axe_rare_04
text: After Axe choked the beast, it made a good raft. That was nice because Axe needed a nap.
text_simple: after axe choked the beast it made a good raft that was nice because axe needed a nap

name: jung_axe_rare_05
text: Axe woke up when the gryftok raft went over a waterfall. Then Axe hit his head on a rock and got sleepy again.
text_simple: axe woke up when the gryftok raft went over a waterfall then axe hit his head on a rock and got sleepy again

name: jung_axe_rare_06_02
text: Now Axe is alone. Alone with no axe... The only law here is jungle law. And Axe's fists are enforcers.
